name: Brain_Peperuga
description:
This project was made using [XS Engine](https://xs-engine.itch.io/xs) made by BUas.
The base of this project was taken from [here](https://bojan.itch.io/peperuga)

What I added to it were the boss's wing-flapping mechanic and the player's ability to shoot missiles. In addition to that, I got some procedural assets from Levon Dyulgarian.

Controls:
ARROW KEYS - Move around

Shoot: 
Z - Normal Bullets
X - Seeking Missiles

To restart, hover the mouse at the upper edge of the screen and a menu should appear where you press the restart button. There you can tweak the game settings too.
